prompts: Create a powerful bull-like Pokemon with a strong, muscular body and impressive horns.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a wild bull, showcasing fierce determination and strength.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a bull, with earthy tones and a robust build.
Make a Pokemon that has a majestic appearance with a mix of brown and gray colors, symbolizing power.
Imagine a Pokemon that represents freedom and untamed nature, with a strikingly bold design.
Design a Pokemon featuring a harmonious blend of colors, reflecting the wildness of grasslands and mountains.
Show me a Pokemon with a sturdy physique, exuding an aura of confidence and resilience.
